message: "Though this experience is different from other classes, this is something that I truly want to do," said student Stacy Cossin. "This experience has been truly rewarding because as a group we were able to improve the quality of people's lives. It is an amazing feeling to know that you are part of a team that can truly work together to make a small change."

data.description: Courtesy of Marshall UniversityHUNTINGTON - A group of Marshall University's Digital Forensics and Information Assurance students, faculty, and staff have assisted in the liberation of nearly 40 child trafficking victims
data.title: Marshall students and staff help in liberation of child trafficking victims
